feed.title: EVOCATION
feed.subtitle: A Horizon 2020 Marie Skłodowska-Curie Actions Innovative Training Network

entry.title: EVOCATION has officially started
entry.content: The Marie Skłodowska-Curie Innovative Training Network Advanced Visual and Geometric Computing for 3D Capture, Display, and Fabrication (EVOCATION) has officially started on October 1, 2018. For more information go here.
entry.summary: The Marie Skłodowska-Curie Innovative Training Network Advanced Visual and Geometric Computing for 3D Capture, Display, and Fabrication (EVOCATION) has officially started on October 1, 2018. For more information go here.
